attributes.action: Scrap the e-petitions website because politicians are worthless and deep down, you know they wont act on serious suggestions.
attributes.additional_details:
Most politicians in the UK are worthless, greedy incompetents who willingly lie and deceive the electorate.
This e-petitions website gives the impression that any petitions deemed important by people who vote for them will be given time in parliament for discussion. However that is a complete lie because anything that voters deem important are usually ignored by all politicians because they are gutless. Foreign aid, immigration, welfare, EU.....Never going to get any serious airtime.
This website should be shut and the money used to run it put into something more worthwhile.
